docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Ingredients 1 lb sweet italian sausage 1 onion, diced 2 celery, diced 2 carrot, diced 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 28 oz can crushed tomatoes 1 tsp dried basil t tsp dried oregano 1/2 tsp fennel seed, crushed 4 tbsp fresh italian parsley, chopped Directions Brown sausage Add mirepoix, sautee Add garlic, sautee until fragrant Add crushed tomatoes, add dried herbs, bring to boil, drop to simmer for at least an hour Add fresh parsley 20 minutes before serving
docs.title: Sausage Ragu

docs.text: 1 lb sweet italian sausage 1 onion, diced 2 celery, diced 2 carrot, diced 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 28 oz can crushed tomatoes 1 tsp dried basil t tsp dried oregano 1/2 tsp fennel seed, crushed 4 tbsp fresh italian parsley, chopped
docs.title: Ingredients

docs.text: Brown sausage Add mirepoix, sautee Add garlic, sautee until fragrant Add crushed tomatoes, add dried herbs, bring to boil, drop to simmer for at least an hour Add fresh parsley 20 minutes before serving
